GS26sarvmtsu:649: ādye sadopalambhaprasaṅgaḥ, ekālokābhāvasya sarvadā sarvatra sambhavāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:650: dvitīye na kadācidapi tama upalabhyeta, sarvālokābhāvasya kvacidapyasambhavāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:652: bhāvatvenopalabhyamānasya tamaso 'bhāvatvakalpane prakāśasya tamaso 'bhāvatvakalpanā kathaṃ nivāryeta |
GS26sarvmtsu:653: abhāvamanaṅgīkurvato guro rūpadarśanābhāvaśca nāstīti tamasastadrūpatvakathā kathaṅkāraṃ saṅgacchatām
GS26sarvmtsu:654: abhāvajñānasya nirviṣayatvaṃ vadannasau bhāvajñānasya nirālambanatvaṃ sādhayantaṃ mādhyamikaṃ vā kathaṃ nirākuryāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:656: taduktaṃ bhaṭṭapādaiḥ- ''tamaḥ khalu calaṃ nīlaṃ parāparavibhāgavat |
GS26sarvmtsu:659: vedasya nityatve svataḥ prāmāṇye ca satyapi mantrārthavādabhāgasyopaniṣadbhāgasyetihāsapurāṇānāṃ
GS26sarvmtsu:661: vidhiśeṣatvena vā kathañcit prāmāṇyaṃ, svarbhūpātālalokānāṃ nityatvaṃ,
GS26sarvmtsu:668: pratyabhijñā ca prāgajñātaghaṭādisthāyyavagāhitvenānubhava evāntarbhavatīti grahaṇasmaraṇarūpeṇa dvairāśyameva jñānam |
GS26sarvmtsu:672: jātā tu vaiśeṣikādivajjaḍadravyaviśeṣo buddhyādidharmāśrayo 'ta eva dehādivilakṣaṇo nityo vibhurlokatrayaṃ karmavaśād bhraman
GS26sarvmtsu:676: svatojñānaṃ, tadāśrayatvena jñātā, tadviṣayatvena ghaṭaśca prakāśata iti tripuṭīpratyakṣavādī gururbhāṣate |
GS26sarvmtsu:688: (asminpra? )ato 'gniṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyasmin vākye yajetetyatra pratyayāṃśena liṅā niyogaḥ pratīyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:690: sa ca kasyacit kasmiṃścid viṣaye prasiddha iti yajatidhātulakṣaṇayā prakṛtyā viṣayaḥ, svargakāma iti niyojyaśca samarpyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:691: agniṣṭomeneti tṛtīyāśrutyā kasmin yāge niyoga iti viśeṣārpaṇam,
GS26sarvmtsu:700: gurorapi guroḥ kumārasyānubhavasmaraṇapratyabhijñābhedena, anubhavepi samyaṅmithyāsaṃśayabhedena cānekavidhāni jñānāni kaṇādākṣapādapatañjalyādivat |
GS26sarvmtsu:703: na ca jñānāśrayasya dravyasya jñānādanyatvānna jñānasaṃbhedaḥ sambhavatīti vācyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:713: ato rajatānubhavasaṃskāravataḥ puṃsaḥ kācādikaraṇadoṣāt sādṛśyādiviṣayadoṣācca sitabhāsvaravastumātratayā
GS26sarvmtsu:716: ayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñānasya ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmītyauttarakālikajñānena viṣayīkriyamāṇatvāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:723: sa hi sarvaṃ vastu jānannātmānamapi jānāti |
GS26sarvmtsu:725: sā ca kiṃ kena kathaṃ vetyaṃśatrayavatī(pratīyāḥ?) |
GS26sarvmtsu:734: anayoḥ pakṣayorya ātmanaḥ svarūpāvasthitilakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ so 'pi karmaṇaiva labhyaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:737: nityanaimittikāni cānutiṣṭhataḥ prācīnāni śubhāśubhakarmāṇi ca phalabhogena kṣapayataśca yajamānasyāyatnato jñānamantareṇaiva svarūpāvasthitirbhavatīti |
GS26sarvmtsu:739: gurukumārayorasarvajñatve sarvajñatve vā nirīśvaraṃ viśvamiti vacanamaviśvāsyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:744: atha taistārkikābhimata īśvara eva nirasto nopaniṣadabhimataḥ kṣetrajñasvarūpabhūta iti cet
GS26sarvmtsu:746: 'karmaiva dehināmiṣṭāniṣṭaphala(daṃ) neśvara iti vadatāṃ vedasya dharmaikaniṣṭhato cābhyupagacchatāṃ
GS26sarvmtsu:748: anumānapramāṇakatvaṃ ca parameśvarasya svaireva nirastamāgamasya dharmaikaparatvaṃ ca sādhitamiti kiṃpramāṇakaḥ syāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:749: svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇo yo mokṣa uktaḥ, tatrāpi kimātmā prāk
GS26sarvmtsu:751: ādye na mokṣasya karmasādhyatvam, utpattyāptivikṛtisaṃskārātmakatvāt karmaphalasya siddhasya cotpattyādyasaṃbhavāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:755: karmasādhyatve mokṣasya nityapuruṣārthatā ca na syāt, yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamiti nyāyāt
GS26sarvmtsu:756: jaḍātmavāde kaivalyasya śūnyakalpatā cāparihāryā pāṣāṇakalpatā vāstheyā |
GS26sarvmtsu:760: jñeyaṃ ca tad jñānaṃ ceti virodhāt |
GS26sarvmtsu:766: teṣāṃ ca buddhivṛttiviśeṣatvena jaḍatvānna svataḥ prakāśātmakatā saṅgacchata iti cidātmasānnidhyādeva tathātvamāstheyam |
GS26sarvmtsu:767: ''tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti''; iti śruteḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:772: kiñca sarvavastūnāṃ bhedo nāmaikaḥ, kiṃ vānekaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:776: dvitīye tvātmana eva bhedaśabdārthatāpattiḥ, ekasya sarvagatasyājaḍasya vastunastallakṣaṇatvāt
GS26sarvmtsu:777: acetanaścet sa kiṃ bhedāntaramapekṣate , kiṃ vānāpekṣate |
GS26sarvmtsu:780: tasmāt svarūpatvena dharmatvena vā bhedo na nirvoḍhuṃ śakyaḥ śakreṇāpīti |
GS26sarvmtsu:795_0: 'indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate'; iti śrutestasyāḥ pratijīvaṃ bhedaścāstīti yuge yuge mumukṣavo jīvā vāsudevasaṅkarṣaṇapradyumnāniruddhākhyacaturvyūhātmano
GS26sarvmtsu:795_1: bhagavataḥ śravaṇakīrtenadhyānapūjanāni bhaktiśraddhāpūrvamanutiṣṭhanto bhagavatprasādena janmādisaṃsārakartrīṃ tanmāyāmatilaṅghya
GS26sarvmtsu:798: ajñānīni bahūnyasaṃkhyavapuṣo jīvānmumukṣūnapi jñānājñānasamāśrayādanuyugaṃ teṣāṃ ca niḥśreyasam
GS26sarvmtsu:803: nirguṇabrahmapradhānānāśaṅkarabhagavatpādādīnāmaupaniṣadānāṃ paurāṇikānāṃ ca ṣaḍvidhāṣṭavidhapramāṇavādināṃ paramārthataḥ saccidānandabrahmaikameva tattvam |
GS26sarvmtsu:805: pramātṛpramāṇaprameyātmakasya viśvasya tasmin kalpitatvena tataḥ pṛthagasattvāt, svato jaḍatvena tadadhīnaprakāśatvācca |
GS26sarvmtsu:807: kiṃ punarbhāvā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ, ātmaiva ced vastu |
GS26sarvmtsu:808: yadi ca so- 'khaṇḍātmā, kuto jagajjīveśvarātmakaṃ dvaitamavabhāsate |
GS26sarvmtsu:809: sa cenna vastu, na caikassaḥ, kutastarāṃ viśvaṃ bhāseta |
GS26sarvmtsu:810: na khalvekaṃ svaprakāśaṃ ca tattvamanapekṣyānekātmakasya jaḍasya viśvasya siddhiḥ sādhayituṃ śakyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:814: sā hi idami sitabhāsvaravastumātratvena jñātāpi svena rūpeṇājñātā satī rajatānubhavasaṃskāravataḥ puṃsaḥ svāvidyāvijṛmbhitarajatābhāsātmanā bhāsate |
GS26sarvmtsu:818: asmin pakṣe 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaśceti dvau padārthau |
GS26sarvmtsu:821: māyā ca na satī, sata ātmano 'nyatvāt,
GS26sarvmtsu:839: iyameva kvacidavidyeti kvacit prakṛtiriti kvacidakṣaramiti kvacicchaktiriti kvacinmoha iti cocyate |
GS26sarvmtsu:840: (tadvata ātmanaḥ sakāśādākāśādīni pañca bhūtāni tebhyaścidātmādhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭiśarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:841: paurāṇikāstu dvaitasya cādhiṣṭhānasattayeva śabdapratibhāsaḥ, yathā rajatasya |
GS26sarvmtsu:843: asmin pakṣe vyavahāradaśāyāṃ dṛg dṛśyaṃ ceti dvau padārthau |
GS26sarvmtsu:851: tebhyaḥ samaṣṭivyaṣṭirūpāṇi śarīrāṇi cotpadyanta iti vedāntinaḥ |
GS26sarvmtsu:857: jñānaśakteḥ sāttvikāhaṃkārād digādicaturdaśakaraṇadevatā antaḥkaraṇāni ca jāyante |
GS26sarvmtsu:859: tānyetāni mahadādyavanyantāni māyāvinā puruṣeṇa preritānyanyonyaṃ militvā haimaṃ brahmāṇḍamārabhante
GS26sarvmtsu:860: tatra ca caturdaśa bhuvanāni carturvidhaśarīrāṇi ca bhavantīti, teṣu ca deheṣu sarvanidānabhūtaścidātmā sākṣitvenābhimānitvena praviśati |
GS26sarvmtsu:870: sarvakṣetreṣveka eva sthitaḥ san sarvānkṣetrajñānniyamayati ca |
GS26sarvmtsu:876_0: sa ca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'; ityādiśrutyā ātmadarśanamanūdya tatsādhanatvena śravaṇādividhānād, vedāntaśravaṇādi kurvato
